privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use and protect your personal information.
privacy_policy.informationdesc: We collect information you provide, cookies, and anonymized analytics data to improve the service.
privacy_policy.howweusedesc: Information is used to operate, maintain and provide the features of the website, and to analyze usage patterns.
privacy_policy.yourrightsdesc: You can request access, correction or deletion of your personal data by contacting us on the site.
